title: FPGA-Based Deep Learning System Implementation Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital logic design and Python programming knowledge, understanding of fundamental deep learning concepts
context.additional_context: Learners design deep learning accelerators applicable to industry using individual FPGA development boards and cloud HLS tools.

learning_goals: Explain the architectural differences between N-Fold and Flow in FPGA and select appropriate hardware structures for a given deep learning model.
Implement convolution/pooling/batch normalization layers in hardware using HLS tools and optimize resource utilization.
Deploy a deep learning model trained on real datasets to an FPGA and measure/improve real-time inference performance.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
